indicator_name: Superficie de bosque en proporción a la superficie total
national_indicator_description: Superficie de bosque en proporción a la superficie total
target_name: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
goal_name: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
source_organisation_1: Elaborated by SADEI based on data from the sources detailed in the methodology
